SEARCH
Package org.hibernate.search.mapper.pojo.mapping.definition.programmatic

Interface PropertyMappingGenericFieldOptionsStep

All Superinterfaces:
PropertyMappingFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingGenericFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingNonFullTextFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingGenericFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingStandardFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingGenericFieldOptionsStep>, PropertyMappingStep
public interface PropertyMappingGenericFieldOptionsStep extends PropertyMappingNonFullTextFieldOptionsStep<PropertyMappingGenericFieldOptionsStep>
The step in a property-to-index-field mapping where optional parameters can be set, when the index field is a generic field.
